entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of showers. Low 10. POP 60%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 60 percent chance of showers this evening with risk of a severe thunderstorm. Fog patches developing overnight. Wind south 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low 10. Forecast issued 7:02 PM CDT Wednesday 10 May 2023
